abstract: New York wedding photographer Terry deRoy Gruber has revived the banquet photo, 12-by-20 inch black-and-white group portrait most popular in the late 1880s to the 1960s.
snippet: A New York photographer has revived the banquet photo, a 12-by-20 inch black-and-white group portrait most popular in the late 1880s to the 1960s.
lead_paragraph: A New York photographer has revived the banquet photo, a 12-by-20 inch black-and-white group portrait most popular in the late 1880s to the 1960s.

headline.main: Making Sure No Guest Is Forgotten
